body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Exhibits     Georgia Historic Town Sites                Georgia Historic Town Sites             Chattooga Town All the People were Amazed - Why?         Island Town Persistence in Chaos - Only 10 percent of Cherokee original territory remained by 1819. How would they persevere?         Dirt Town A Snapshot of Cherokee Life - How were the poorer Cherokee people treated during removal?
title: Trail Of Tears National Historic Trail: Georgia Historic Town Sites
